name: Wangan Trial
overview: Wangan is a stretch of highway in Tokyo, Japan that is infamous for street racing. Part of the Shuto Expressway, the Japanese meaning of "Wangan" is "bayshore". This coastal route is so famous for racing, that several legendary racing icons have illegally street raced this strip of pavement. Video games, television series, and more have been based on the street racing saga surrounding Wangan.
